interpretation:
The Woman Tipping Hand card represents a confident and assertive woman who is not afraid to speak her mind. This card encourages you to embrace your sassiness and use it to your advantage. You have the ability to help others by sharing your wisdom and expertise. Trust your instincts and don't be afraid to take charge. 

If you're facing a difficult decision, this card suggests that you should trust yourself and your intuition. You have the power to make the right choice and guide others in the right direction. Be confident in your abilities and don't let anyone tell you that you can't achieve your goals.

Overall, the Woman Tipping Hand card is a reminder to be bold, brave, and unapologetically yourself. Embrace your strengths and share them with the world. You have the power to make a positive impact on others and create the life you want.
